properties.name: jwt.token.header
properties.description: Name of JWT header in HTTP request.

properties.name: jwt.token.secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign token.

properties.name: mail.from
properties.description: Source address for system generated email messages.

properties.name: twilio.from
properties.description: Phone number to send SMS from.

properties.name: device.udid-header
properties.description: Name of device UDID header in HTTP request.

properties.name: device.platform-header
properties.description: Name of client platform header in HTTP request.

properties.name: device.session-key-platform
properties.description: Session key for recognized client platform.

properties.name: pushnotifications.apple-sandbox
properties.description: Flag to indicate sandbox debug enviroments.

properties.name: pushnotifications.apple-certificate-path
properties.description: Path of Apple push notification certificate.

properties.name: pushnotifications.apple-certificate-password
properties.description: Password to encrypt Apple push notification certificate.

properties.name: pushnotifications.google-cloud-messaging-key
properties.description: Authentication key to Google GCM service.
